content.description: A long traverse of several continuous horizontal cracks. Start a few feet right of Mean Green and traverse right on the obvious lip, through an alcove, and around a corner onto the western aspect of the wall. Keep going right as the lip turns to a crack, and at some point drop down to  lower horizontal cracks. Continue through a steep cruxy section with underclings and sidepull flakes, pull up again to slopers, and continue across a thin slabby section and all the way right until you reach an obvious stopping point at a ledgy broken area. It's pumpy!
content.protection: A pad is nice for a rock under the crux
content.location: This traverse starts a few feet right of Mean Green and goes right.

content.description: A classic problem up a gently overhanging green face with many horizontal slashes. Sit start at the block on the lower right side of the face. Pull on and move up and left through the multitude of sloping horizontal slashes to a cruxy mantel high off the deck.
content.protection: Pads, spotter, a little courage for the mantel
content.location: On the right side of the Gunks wall. Look for the obvious green face.
